name: Break Out (Charlie Wedge)
description:
Break Out!

A 3D remake based on the 1976 Breakout by Atari.  Using only your paddle, bounce the forever moving ball to eliminate all the bricks. However, if you miss the ball and it passes your paddle, you lose.

  • Collect coins as you win and progress, which are used to customise the apparence of your padldle, ball and bricks!
  • Play compeititive local multiplayer to see who can eliminate their bricks the fastest. If you lose your ball in this game mode, you're punished by the other player getting a time advantage!
  • Spin the ball to guide it towards powerups to give yourself temporary advantages, such as a bigger paddle, ball, protection wall, and a brick magnet! 

Ultimately, Break Out is a quick and fun way to kill time when you're bored.
